data.comment: The big names in today's match at Asiad Main Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Hee-Gon awards the away team a throw-in.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Jeonbuk.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Busan to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Free kick Busan.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a Busan throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.

Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
Busan's [49] misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Asiad Main Stadium.
At Asiad Main Stadium, Jeonbuk are penalized for being offside.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan just outside Jeonbuk's area.
Busan are pushing forward but Yun Suk-young's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
Throw-in Busan.

Goal! Hong Jeong-ho heads Jeonbuk into a 0-1 lead.
Son Jun-ho instrumental with a fine assist.

A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.

Busan have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
Son Jun-ho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Kim Jin-su of Jeonbuk smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jo Gue-sung hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Busan for Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk's Takahiro Kunimoto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kim Hee-Gon awards Busan a goal kick.
Kim Hee-Gon awards the away team a throw-in.

Kim Bo-kyung is back on the pitch.

Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Busan.
Busan are whistled for offside.

Jeonbuk pushes forward through Lee Seung-ki, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Busan.

A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Jeonbuk.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Jeonbuk's Kim Bo-kyung breaks free at Asiad Main Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
